description: This file provides CRUD operations for a 'todos' resource using SQLAlchemy ORM and raw SQL queries. It defines functions to list, create, retrieve, update, and delete todo items from a database.

methods.name: Dict _row_to_dict(row)
methods.description: Converts a SQLAlchemy row object to a dictionary.

methods.name: List[Dict] list_todos(db: Session)
methods.description: Retrieves all todo items from the database.

methods.name: Dict create_todo(db: Session, title: str, description: str = "", status: str = "pending")
methods.description: Creates a new todo item with the provided title, description, and status.

methods.name: Optional[Dict] get_todo(db: Session, todo_id: int)
methods.description: Fetches a single todo item by its ID.

methods.name: Optional[Dict] update_todo( db: Session, todo_id: int, fields: Dict )
methods.description: Updates fields of an existing todo item by its ID.

methods.name: bool delete_todo(db: Session, todo_id: int)
methods.description: Deletes a todo item by its ID.

ctags.name: create_todo
ctags.pattern: /^def create_todo(db: Session, title: str, description: str = "", status: str = "pending") -> Dict/
ctags.signature: (db: Session, title: str, description: str = "", status: str = "pending")

ctags.name: update_todo
ctags.signature: ( db: Session, todo_id: int, fields: Dict )
